original_definition: 'Ecodesign' means the integration of environmental aspects into product design with the aim of improving the environmental performance of the product throughout its whole life cycle;
generated_definition: 'Ecodesign' means the design of products and services with a reduced environmental impact throughout their lifecycle, taking into account the entire supply chain and end-of-life stages.

Article 2: ‘Ecodesign’ means the integration of environmental aspects into product design with the aim of improving the environmental performance of the product throughout its whole life cycle;
